name: Genesis of Dreams
overview: Get ready for a new 8-bit handheld adventure! Genesis of Dreams! When 2 friends, Alex and Max, slept on the job, Mech steals the mystical Elegems,and now its trapped in the planet Genesis! As they try to get the Elegems back, they find out that Mech also mind-controlled the rulers of North Island, the main island of planet Genesis. Now you must help Alex and Max to stop Mech and get the Elegems back Can you do it?
